#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define gc getchar_unlocked
vector<int> v(10000001);
vector<bool> mark(10000001);
inline int read_int(){
    char c = gc();
    while(c<'0' || c>'9') {
        c = gc();
    }
    int ret = 0;
    while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
        ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
        c = gc();
    }
    return ret;
}
inline void print(int number)
{
	if (number)
	{
		char str[11];
		
		int i = 10;
		while (number > 0)
		{
			--i;
			str[i] = (number % 10) + '0';
			number /= 10;
		}
		str[10] = 0;
		
		fwrite_unlocked(str + i, 1, 10 - i, stdout);
	}
	else
	{
		putchar_unlocked('0');
	}
}
int main()
{
	int i,j,c=0,t,n;
	for(j=4;j<=10000000;j=j+2)
		mark[j]=true;
	for(j=9;j<=10000000;j=j+3)
		mark[j]=true;
	v[2]=v[3]=1;
	for(i=6;i<=10000000;i=i+6)
	{
		if(!mark[i-1])
		{
			v[i-1]=1;
			if((ll)(i-1)*(ll)(i-1)<10000001)
			{
				for(j=(i-1)*(i-1);j<=10000000;j=j+(i-1))
					mark[j]=true;
			}
		}
		if(!mark[i+1])
		{
			v[i+1]=1;
			if((ll)(i+1)*(ll)(i+1)<10000001)
			{
				for(j=(i+1)*(i+1);j<=10000000;j=j+(i+1))
					mark[j]=true;
			}
		}
	}
	for(i=2;i<10000001;i++)
	{
		v[i]+=v[i-1];
	}
	t=read_int();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=read_int();
		print(v[n]-v[n/2]);
		putchar_unlocked('\n');
	}
	return 0;
}
